base.name: ghost
base.installation_report: Goto to _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/ghost/setup/ and follow the instructions

start.content:
#!/bin/bash
PID_FILE=/var/run/engines/pid
export PID_FILE
if ! test -f  /home/fs/config_and_data/.configured
 then
    cp -r /home/fs_src/config_and_data /home/fs
    touch /home/fs/config_and_data/.configured
 fi
. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh

cd /home/app

npm start --production > /var/log/ghost.log &
pid=$!
echo $pid >$PID_FILE

startup_complete

wait
sleep 600
shutdown_complete

exit

post_install.content:
#!/bin/bash
cd /home/app
ghost install   --url _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)\
                --admin-url https://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/ \
                --port 9001 \
                --ip 0.0.0.0 \
                --db mysql \
                --dbhost $dbhost \
                --dbuser $dbuser \
                --dbpass $dbpasswd \
                --dbname $dbname \
                --mail smtp \
                --mailhost _Engines_System(smtp_host) \
                --mailport 25 \
                -l
